data: {"concept_id": "character_roles", "concept_name": "Character Roles", "type": "element", "definition": "The narrative jobs characters perform—hero, villain, mentor, sidekick, foil, confidant, catalyst, etc.—which organize conflict, alliances, growth, and theme.", "scope_notes": "Roles are functional, flexible, and can overlap or shift. Measure the strength of a role by its impact on choices, stakes, and theme.", "axes": "facet|strength", "axis_values": "function|flexibility|interaction|theme_link|strength_control | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "role_interactions|role_dynamics|identity|drive|motivation|decision_style|theme", "conflicts_with": "rigid_labels|single_role_only|personality_confusion|ignore_minor_roles|genre_exceptionalism", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_roles_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_roles_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "signal_id": "sig_function", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "function", "description": "Clear function stated or enacted: who drives, who blocks, who guides, who contrasts, who catalyzes.", "detection_hint": "Questions answered: What is this character for? What do they change?", "false_positive_risks": "Bio-style labels with no effect on plot or relationships.", "minimal_example": "Mentor sets the test; foil frames a moral choice; villain blocks the need.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "signal_id": "sig_flexibility", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "flexibility", "description": "Roles overlap or shift with seeds and cost (mentor→antagonist, sidekick→hero, villain→ally).", "detection_hint": "Pre-signals, hinge event, new behavior with consequences.", "false_positive_risks": "Whiplash flips for novelty; cosmetic quirks only.", "minimal_example": "Sidekick assumes the mission when the hero fails and pays a price.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "signal_id": "sig_interaction", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "interaction", "description": "Role clashes/alliances create scene purpose and escalate stakes.", "detection_hint": "Identify pairs/webs that alter decisions (hero–villain, hero–mentor, hero–foil).", "false_positive_risks": "Banter or conflict that changes nothing.", "minimal_example": "Villain forces a bargain that stains the hero’s code; mentor refusal sharpens resolve.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "signal_id": "sig_theme_link", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "theme_link", "description": "Role design embodies the theme (freedom vs control, pride vs humility, tradition vs change).", "detection_hint": "Moments where clashes carry the idea beyond plot mechanics.", "false_positive_risks": "Action divorced from idea; theme statements without enactment.", "minimal_example": "Hero/villain clash dramatizes the core value divide.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "signal_id": "sig_strength_control", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "strength_control", "description": "Strength tuned via stakes, publicness, and consequence to calibrate impact.", "detection_hint": "Raise by personalizing threat or cost; lower by limiting presence/scope.", "false_positive_risks": "Giving equal spotlight regardless of function.", "minimal_example": "Mentor’s advice triggers a costly choice; sidekick gets agency in a pinch.", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "signal_id": "sig_strength_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Minor presence; clear function but small impact; brief test/support moments.", "detection_hint": "One beat gatekeeper/confidant; limited stakes and visibility.", "false_positive_risks": "Flat cameo with no function.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "signal_id": "sig_strength_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Ongoing influence on choices and relationships; reversible consequences.", "detection_hint": "Recurring support/contrast; subplots shaped; some cost.", "false_positive_risks": "Busy scenes without effect.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "signal_id": "sig_strength_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Major driver of plot/theme; public, costly, irreversible consequences.", "detection_hint": "Hero/villain/mentor roles dominate turning points; role shifts stick.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle with next-scene reset.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "misconception_id": "rigid_labels", "description": "Treating roles as fixed stereotypes instead of functions that can evolve.", "tells": "Static hero/villain with no nuance or cost.", "likely_causes": "Over-reliance on tropes.", "corrective_feedback": "Seed overlap/shifts with consequence.", "micro_drill": "Plan 1 role shift with pre-signal + hinge + cost.", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "misconception_id": "single_role_only", "description": "Assuming a character can only hold one role across the story.", "tells": "No overlap or growth.", "likely_causes": "Fear of complexity.", "corrective_feedback": "Allow hybrid/transition roles with triggers.", "micro_drill": "Map a sidekick→hero ladder across 3 beats.", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "misconception_id": "personality_confusion", "description": "Confusing personality/backstory with role function.", "tells": "‘Brave’ = hero by default.", "likely_causes": "Mixing traits with function.", "corrective_feedback": "Define the job first; prove with choices.", "micro_drill": "Answer: what decision does this role force/change?", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "misconception_id": "ignore_minor_roles", "description": "Overlooking confidants, catalysts, foils, thresholds; cast feels thin.", "tells": "Hero and villain do all work.", "likely_causes": "Underusing small functions.", "corrective_feedback": "Give minor roles precise jobs with payoffs.", "micro_drill": "Add 1 confidant beat and 1 catalyst beat that alter options.", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_roles", "misconception_id": "genre_exceptionalism", "description": "Believing roles matter only in certain genres.", "tells": "Skipping role design in slice-of-life/comedy.", "likely_causes": "Misunderstanding universality.", "corrective_feedback": "Use roles in any genre to steer conflict/theme.", "micro_drill": "Label roles in a quiet scene and state their function.", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_roles_identify_facet_strength", "concept_id": "character_roles", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label a passage’s dominant facet (function/flexibility/interaction/theme_link/strength_control) and role strength (low/med/high). Justify with one cue.", "expected_features": "Correct facet+strength; cites evidence; ties to consequence or theme.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels with precise evidence and consequence/theme note", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic evidence", "Developing": "Labels off or evidence vague"}, "distractor_strategy": "Trap: labels with no effect; spectacle with reset.", "hint_steps": "1) What job is performed? 2) Who pays? 3) What idea is carried?", "variation_axes": "facet|strength", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_roles_cast_balance", "concept_id": "character_roles", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "map", "prompt_template": "Create a cast role map with target weights (e.g., hero 40, villain 30, mentor 15, foil 10, catalyst 5) and check sample scenes against it.", "expected_features": "Weights reflected in beats; filler reduced; clarity improved.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Weights and scenes align; edits justified", "Meets": "Mostly aligned", "Developing": "Lopsided without fixes"}, "distractor_strategy": "Trap: equal time for everyone regardless of function.", "hint_steps": "1) Assign weights 2) Sample beats 3) Adjust focus", "variation_axes": "balance|beats", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_roles_clash_design", "concept_id": "character_roles", "cognitive_goal": "compose", "task_type": "generate", "prompt_template": "Design a role clash (hero–villain, hero–foil, mentor–hero) that advances plot and theme. State the scene goal and the irreversible change.", "expected_features": "Clash changes options and echoes theme; goal explicit or implied.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Change sticks and carries theme", "Meets": "Some change and relevance", "Developing": "Cool scene, no effect"}, "distractor_strategy": "Trap: witty banter with no outcome.", "hint_steps": "1) Name pair 2) State goal 3) Land cost/change", "variation_axes": "pair|goal|cost", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_roles_subvert_stereotype", "concept_id": "character_roles", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Twist one archetype (e.g., idealist villain, reluctant mentor) and edit the scene so the twist changes the outcome.", "expected_features": "Variation affects decisions, not just flavor.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Outcome clearly altered by twist", "Meets": "Twist visible with partial effect", "Developing": "Cosmetic only"}, "distractor_strategy": "Trap: quirks without function.", "hint_steps": "1) Choose twist 2) Change choice 3) Show consequence", "variation_axes": "variation|stakes", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_roles_adjust_strength", "concept_id": "character_roles", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "Raise or lower a role’s strength by changing stakes, publicness, and persistence of consequences.", "expected_features": "Edits alter visibility/cost; resets removed.", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Strength shift clear and sticky", "Meets": "Some shift", "Developing": "Wordier, same impact"}, "distractor_strategy": "Trap: adjective inflation.", "hint_steps": "1) Personalize threat/cost 2) Widen/limit audience 3) Remove/add reset", "variation_axes": "stakes|publicness|persistence", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_roles_1", "concept_id": "character_roles", "axis_value": "function|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "Mentor refuses help; the refusal forces the hero to take responsibility.", "context_tags": "mentor|function", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_roles_2", "concept_id": "character_roles", "axis_value": "flexibility|high", "label": "strong", "text": "Sidekick publicly takes the lead after the hero fails, changing team dynamics.", "context_tags": "shift|cost", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_roles_3", "concept_id": "character_roles", "axis_value": "interaction|high", "label": "strong", "text": "Villain’s bargain stains the hero’s code and locks the finale path.", "context_tags": "clash|theme", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_roles_4", "concept_id": "character_roles", "axis_value": "theme_link|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "Foil’s kindness reframes the hero’s choice about mercy.", "context_tags": "contrast|idea", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_roles_weak_1", "concept_id": "character_roles", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "A bio lists ‘villain’ but nothing the character does blocks the hero.", "context_tags": "label_only", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_roles_weak_2", "concept_id": "character_roles", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Huge confrontation, next scene everyone acts the same.", "context_tags": "reset", "source_file": "Character Roles.md", "source_md5": "e5b2fdff82f8049344e7fdb0d12bd3e4", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:48:12.050646Z"}
